Ndị Kamba ma ọ bụ Akamba (nke a na-akpọ Wakamba mgbe ụfọdụ) bụ agbụrụ Bantu nke na-ebi n'ógbè Kenya site na Nairobi ruo Tsavo na ugwu ruo Embu, n'akụkụ ndịda nke mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ mbụ
A na-akpọ ala a Ukambani ma mejupụtara Makueni County, Kitui County na Machakos County. Ha bụkwa agbụrụ nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara 8 gụnyere Nairobi na Mombasa.
Ha nwere njikọ chiri anya n'asụsụ na omenala na ndị Kikuyu, ndị Embu, ndị Mbeere na ndị Meru, ma ruo n'ókè ụfọdụ metụtara Digo na Giriama nke oke osimiri Kenya
Kambas gbadoro ụkwụ na ala dị larịị nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Kenya site na gburugburu ugwu Kenya ruo n'ụsọ oké osimiri.
Ìgwè mbụ nke ndị Kamba biri na Ugwu Mbooni nke oge a na Machakos District nke Kenya na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke iri na asaa, tupu ha agbasa na Machakus, Makueni na Kitui Districts.
